div.p: The SearchParameter resource may be used to define searches on extensions. Depending on the context of the extension (as defined in the StructureDefinition), this may require multiple instances of the SearchParameter.xpath element like so:

ul.li: If the extension's context is scoped by a single resource, SearchParameter.base must be set to that resource, and there may be one or more xpath elements corresponding to the elements specified in the extension's context, e.g. "f:Patient/f:name/f:extension[@url='extension url']"
If the extension's context specifies multiple resources, this can be represented with multiple elements in the SearchParameter.base array.

You may use a single xpath element with the full URL of the Extension to indicate that the SearchParameter would search in all elements of the given SearchParameter.base resource for the given extension.
